segments.text: I find myself looking at this kitchen scene again.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange juxtaposition of domestic tasks and impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues to polish her plate with such focused intensity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stack of clean dishes to her right, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s incredible how oblivious she is to the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, are totally engrossed in their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it could go any second, which makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent faces, if I could see them, must be alight with mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry about the inevitable splash and crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be considerable if this continues much longer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation could have been avoided with a simple glance around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a perfect storm of unawareness and childish daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope this family finds a way to sort out their kitchen soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
